text: The Yellow Mountain is a 1954 American western comedy drama movie. It was directed by Jesse Hibbs. Actors include Lex Barker, Mala Powers, Howard Duff, Leo Gordon, and William Demarest. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1954 comedy movies Category:1954 drama movies Category:1950s comedy-drama movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jesse Hibbs
title: The Yellow Mountain
